channel.title: CVE Feed for Lexmark -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lexmark -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-4336|2024-08-06T00:25:14.496Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write exists in the Bzip2 parsing of the Lexmark Perspective Document Filters conversion functionality. A crafted Bzip2 document can lead to a stack-based buffer overflow causing an out-of-bounds write which under the right circumstance could potentially be leveraged by an attacker to gain arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2016-4335|2024-08-06T00:25:14.524Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable buffer overflow exists in the XLS parsing of the Lexmark Perspective Document Filters conversion functionality. A crafted XLS document can lead to a stack based buffer overflow resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2016-5646|2024-08-06T01:08:00.403Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable heap overflow vulnerability exists in the Compound Binary File Format (CBFF) parser functionality of Lexmark Perceptive Document Filters library. A specially crafted CBFF file can cause a code execution. An attacker can send a malformed file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-50737|2024-02-28T02:38:03.334Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: The SE menu contains information used by Lexmark to diagnose device errors. A vulnerability in one of the SE menu routines can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50736|2024-02-28T02:37:45.438Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50735|2024-02-28T02:37:26.310Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A heap corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50734|2024-02-28T01:47:47.211Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50737|2024-08-02T22:16:47.299Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: The SE menu contains information used by Lexmark to diagnose device errors. A vulnerability in one of the SE menu routines can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: A heap corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
